title: Self-Directed Intensive Course for Remote Laparoscopic Surgery Skill Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physiology and anatomy knowledge, general understanding of surgical procedures
context.additional_context: A self-directed remote learning environment utilizing personal laparoscopic training kits.

learning_goals: Learners can achieve performance scores above the expert benchmark (mean - 2SD) in core laparoscopic surgery tasks (5 types).
Learners can apply hand-eye coordination, depth perception, and precision-cutting skills with over 80% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can utilize a task-specific performance evaluation formula (time-error weighting) to conduct self-assessment and develop training plans.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
